items.title: OpenAIâ€™s Open Language Model is Imminent
items.author: Tom Warren
items.summary:
- OpenAI is set to unveil an *open-weight* language model, a significant shift from its typically closed models, *potentially launching next week*.
- This model will be accessible via major cloud providers, impacting Microsoft's exclusivity and revenue-sharing arrangements with OpenAI.
- The release raises questions about the degree of *openness* and licensing, creating uncertainty in how the model will be utilized and replicated.

items.title: The Best Doorbell Cameras
items.author: Jennifer Pattison Tuohy
items.summary:
- Smart video doorbells transform home security by integrating a camera and communication features directly into your front door.
- Consider essential features like *1080p HD video*, fast motion detection, and compatibility with smart home platforms for enhanced functionality.
- The top option recommended is the *Nest Doorbell Wired*, offering reliable performance and advanced smart alerts without subscription fees for basic functionalities.

items.title: Best Tech Gadgets and Deals for Prime Day 2025
items.author: Verge Staff
items.summary:
- *The Verge* staff share their favorite gadgets on sale during Prime Day 2025.  
- Notable products include the waterproof UE Wonderboom 4 speaker and Thermacell mosquito repeller.  
- Discounts marked for popular items like the Instant Pot and immersion blender make this a great shopping opportunity.

items.title: Top 10 Prime Day Deals of 2025
items.author: Barbara Krasnoff
items.summary:
- **AirPods** topped the list with both regular and Pro models being popular among readers. 
- Other popular items include an **Anker travel adapter** and **LifeStraw filters**, indicating diverse purchasing interests beyond tech. 
- Prime Day deals highlight significant savings, such as $100 off on **AirPods Pro** and a **M3 iPad Air** deal including two years of AppleCare.

items.title: Samsung Galaxy Unpacked 2025: Key Announcements
items.author: Emma Roth
items.summary:
- Samsung launched the *Galaxy Z Fold 7* and *Galaxy Z Flip 7*, featuring enhanced displays and *improved cameras*.
- The *Galaxy Watch Ultra 2* and *Watch 8* were also introduced, showcasing new health features and designs.
- New models emphasize *AI integration* with Google, providing advanced functionalities for users.

items.title: Samsung Unveils New Z Flip 7 FE Foldable
items.author: Jess Weatherbed
items.summary:
- Samsung introduced the **Galaxy Z Flip 7 FE**, its first foldable in the *Fan Edition* line, priced at **$899**.
- The device features a **3.4-inch cover screen** and improved specifications compared to its predecessor, though with some downgrades, like *8GB RAM* instead of *12GB*.
- Preorders start today, with general availability set for **July 25th**, and color options vary between the standard and FE models.

items.title: The best Apple Watch Prime Day deals
items.author: Brandt Ranj
items.summary:
- *Prime Day* offers deep discounts on *Apple Watch* models, particularly the *Series 10*.
- The 42mm model is priced at **$279.99**, a drop of **$120**, while the 46mm model is **$309**, also **$120 off**.
- The **Apple Watch Series 10** includes significant upgrades to display and health features, making it a top choice for *iPhone* users.

- The event highlights the **importance of affordability** and new features in *foldable phones*.  
- Anticipation builds around new wearables including the **Galaxy Watch 8 series** and substantial trade-in offers.

items.title: The Best Prime Day Deals on Charging Accessories
items.author: Brandon Russell
items.summary:
- *Prime Day* features significant discounts on charging accessories including **power banks**, wall chargers, and charging stations.
- Deals from trusted brands such as *Anker*, *Belkin*, and *Ugreen* offer up to **55% off** on various products.
- Event runs until *July 11th*, allowing ample time for customers to explore and save on essential tech gear.

items.title: Best Prime Day Robot Vacuum Deals
items.author: Sheena Vasani
items.summary:
- Explore a range of *robot vacuums* on sale during *Amazon Prime Day*, catering to various budgets.

items.title: The 198 Prime Day 2025 deals you can still get
items.author: Brandt Ranj
items.summary:
- *Amazon's Prime Day 2025* offers significant discounts across various tech categories, from headphones to smart home gadgets.
- Notable deals include $100 off *Apple AirPods 4* and $50 off the *Meta Quest 3S headset*.
- Early shopping is encouraged this year to seize discounts, with many products unlikely to be this price again until Black Friday.

items.title: HBO Max is officially HBO Max again
items.author: Dominic Preston
items.summary:
- The streaming app has reverted to its original name, HBO Max.  
- This change follows a previous rebranding to 'Max' in 2023, which was criticized.  
- Users will see the app update automatically without needing to download a new version.

items.title: The Nintendo Switch OLED is $100 off during Prime Day

items.title: Activision pulls Call of Duty game after PC players are hacked
items.author: Dominic Preston
items.summary:
- Activision has removed *Call of Duty: WWII* from Microsoft Store and Game Pass due to *hacking incidents* affecting players' PCs.
- Reports indicate that players experienced *remote code execution* issues, leading to compromised systems after gameplay.
- The game was only added to these platforms in June, and itâ€™s speculated that *older vulnerabilities* from earlier versions are to blame.

items.title: Ikea's Smart Home Revolution: Embracing Matter
items.author: Jennifer Pattison Tuohy
items.summary:
- Ikea is relaunching its *smart home line* with over 20 new Matter-over-Thread compatible products, enhancing interoperability.  
- The Dirigera smart home hub now supports Matter, enabling easier integration with devices from various brands.  
- This shift positions Ikea as a pioneer in mainstreaming Matter technology, making smart homes more *affordable* and user-friendly.

items.title: Ikea's New Speaker Lamp Ditches Sonos for Spotify
items.author: Thomas Ricker
items.summary:
- Ikea's latest speaker lamp shifts from **Sonos** to a more affordable **Bluetooth** design featuring **Spotify Tap**.  
- The new **Blomprakt** speaker lamp launches at under â‚¬100, appealing to a broader audience with price points much lower than previous Sonos options.  
- Embracing lessons learned from their Sonos partnership, Ikea aims to enhance product accessibility and explore innovative home integration solutions.

items.title: The 203 Best Prime Day 2025 Deals
items.author: Cameron Faulkner
items.summary:
- *Prime Day* runs for four days, providing a great opportunity for discounts on tech products.  
- Deals include significant discounts on **laptops**, **headphones**, and **smart home devices** from various retailers.  
- Featured items, such as the **Apple AirPods Pro** and **Samsung OLED TV**, showcase impressive savings and value.

items.title: Grok stops posting text after flood of antisemitism and Hitler praise
Prime Day Headphone Discounts Highlighted

- The roundup also highlights *earbuds* and *headphones* outside Amazon that provide similar savings for consumers without a Prime membership.

items.title: Nintendo Switch 2 Compatible with Existing Docks
items.author: Sean Hollister
items.summary:
- *Nintendo Switch 2* works with existing USB-C docks and webcams after firmware updates. 
- Three manufacturers have successfully adapted their devices: **AverMedia**, **Elgato**, and **Viture**. 
- Continued compatibility may depend on future Nintendo firmware updates that could restrict third-party devices.

items.title: TCL 85-Inch TV on Prime Day Sale: A Great Deal
items.author: John.Higgins
items.summary:
- The **TCL QM8K 85-inch TV** is on sale for **$2,499.99**, offering a **$1,300 discount**.  
- With a peak brightness of over **3,400 nits**, itâ€™s perfect for bright rooms, rivaling brands like **Samsung** and **LG**.  
- Improved **viewing angles** ensure vibrant images for all viewers, enhancing the experience for movie nights and game days.

items.title: Appleâ€™s design team will report to Tim Cook
items.author: Jay Peters
items.summary:
- Apple CEO *Tim Cook* will take over direct oversight of the design team following COO Jeff Williams' retirement. 
- The transition aligns with Apple's upcoming *Liquid Glass design language*, which aims to unify design across its devices. 
- This significant change is part of Apple's broader strategy to enhance user interactions and integrate innovative features across its product line.

items.title: Supreme Court Supports Trump's Federal Workforce Cuts
items.author: Justine Calma
items.summary:
- The *Supreme Court* allows the Trump administration to proceed with mass federal layoffs while a lawsuit against them is ongoing.
- This decision lifts a previous *injunction* that paused the layoffs until legality was determined.
- Critics argue the ruling undermines *democracy* and jeopardizes vital public services.

items.title: Prime Day 2025: Top Deals on Games & Accessories
items.author: Brandt Ranj
items.summary:
- Save on *games*, controllers, headsets, and more this Prime Day.
- Notable deals include *Star Wars Outlaws* and *Pikmin 4* at *$39.99*.
- Gaming hardware like the Asus ROG Ally is *$200 off*, making it a prime time for upgrades.

items.title: Jeff Williams Retiring, Sabih Khan Named COO
items.author: Emma Roth
items.summary:
- *Sabih Khan* will succeed **Jeff Williams** as COO of Apple, effective later this month. 
 - Williams, notable for overseeing the launch of iconic products like the *iPod* and *iPhone*, is retiring after a long tenure.  
 - Khan, a 30-year Apple veteran, faces new challenges with Apple's supply chain amidst current geopolitical issues.

items.title: Appleâ€™s AirPods Pro 2 Discounted
items.author: Brandon Russell
items.summary:
- The **AirPods Pro 2** are now available for **$149**, a **$100 discount** from the original price.  
- This model features improved **noise cancellation**, sound quality, and a **USB-C** charging case.  
- Additional benefits include **FDA approval** as hearing aids, **6 hours** of battery life, and seamless integration with other Apple devices.

items.title: Microsoftâ€™s New 12-Inch Surface Pro for $685
items.author: Todd Haselton
items.summary:
- The **12-inch Surface Pro** is available for *$685*, $115 off its standard price.
- This tablet features a refined design and is powered by the **Snapdragon X Plus** chip, providing a more tablet-like experience.
- While it excels in performance and battery life, its software experience in tablet mode requires improvement compared to the iPad.

items.title: Gmail's New Feature for Easy Unsubscribing
items.author: Andrew Liszewski
items.summary:
- Google introduces a *Manage subscriptions view* in Gmail to help users handle subscription emails.  
- This feature allows users to see a list of frequent senders with *one-click unsubscribe* options next to them.  
- The rollout starts on the web, followed by Android and iOS apps, making it accessible across *personal Google accounts* and *Workspace users* in selective locations.

items.title: Samsung S90D OLED TV: Best Prime Day Deal
items.author: John.Higgins
items.summary:
* The Samsung S90D OLED TV is currently available at a **historic low price**, with the 65-inch model under $1,200.
* It features a **144Hz refresh rate**, G-Sync compatibility, and a special gaming hub for cloud services.
* While it lacks **Dolby Vision** support, the savings during Prime Day make it a **superior choice** over newer models like the S90F.

items.title: James Gunn’s Superman is exactly what DC’s movies have been missing
items.author: Charles Pulliam-Moore

items.title: Zoom's New Meta Quest App Enhances VR Meetings
items.author: Emma Roth
items.summary:
**Zoom has launched a standalone app for Meta Quest headsets.**
- Users can host or join meetings in VR using any Zoom license, supporting various Meta Quest models.
- The app integrates features like seeing other participants and passthrough mode, enhancing the immersive experience.
- Zoom continues to innovate with AI avatars, expanding its virtual interaction capabilities.

items.title: Challenges in Flash Flood Warnings
items.author: Justine Calma
items.summary:
- *Flash floods* develop rapidly, complicating accurate forecasting and timely warnings.
- Texas's recent flooding highlights degraded federal support for **climate research**, affecting real-time predictions.
- The integration of advanced data collection and enhanced communication methods is essential to mitigate risks in forecasting flash floods.

items.title: Amazon gets the green light to sell the Nintendo Switch 2
items.author: Jay Peters
items.summary:
- Amazon has started listings for the *Nintendo Switch 2* in the US, allowing users to register for an *invitation* to purchase. 
- This follows Nintendo's previous removal of listings from Amazon due to pricing disputes with third-party sellers. 
- The Switch 2 has reportedly become the *fastest-selling game console* of all time since its launch on June 5th.

items.title: 55 Prime Day Deals Under $50
items.author: Brandon Russell
items.summary:
- Discover **budget-friendly** deals on gadgets, speakers, and more for *$50 or less* during Prime Day 2025.  
- Selection includes **Bluetooth speakers**, smart home devices, and accessories, all curated for maximum savings.  
- Act fast, as these deals are likely to sell out quickly due to high demand and retailer matches with other competitors like Walmart and Best Buy.

items.title: TSA Ends Shoe Removal Policy for Airport Security
items.author: Andrew J. Hawkins
items.summary:
- The TSA is set to allow travelers to keep their *shoes on* at select airports, reducing a long-standing security requirement. 
- This change is a shift from the shoe removal policy implemented after the 2001 shoe bombing attempt, believed to offer little actual *security benefit*. 
- Critics argue that such measures often merely create an illusion of safety without addressing real threats, highlighting the need for more effective *security practices*.

items.title: Jack Dorsey Launches Encrypted Bluetooth App Bitchat
items.author: Jess Weatherbed
items.summary:
- *Bitchat* is a new peer-to-peer messaging app from Jack Dorsey that uses **Bluetooth** for encrypted communications without internet access.
- The app features privacy protections like *password-protected channels* and a *Panic Mode* to secure data quickly.
- Unlike similar apps, Bitchat boasts a range over 300 meters, making it more effective for private messaging in proximity.

items.title: Best Prime Day Smart Home Deals
items.author: Jennifer Pattison Tuohy
items.summary:
- Explore amazing *smart home deals* this Prime Day with significant price drops. 
- Products range from *smart lighting and air quality devices* to *security cameras and smart speakers*. 
- Jennifer highlights top picks to help you enhance your home with advanced technology at affordable prices.

items.title: How to watch Samsungâ€™s foldable-filled Unpacked event
items.author: Jess Weatherbed
items.summary:
- The **Samsung Galaxy Unpacked event** is on *July 9th, 2025* at 10 AM ET.
- Expected announcements include the *Galaxy Z Fold 7* and *Z Flip 7*, alongside the *Galaxy Watch 8 series*.
- Viewers can watch the livestream on *Samsung's website* or their *YouTube channel*.

items.title: How The New York Times is (still) getting gamed by the right
items.author: Elizabeth Lopatto
items.summary:
- The *New York Times* faces criticism for its news judgments, especially regarding its framing of stories about candidates like Zohran Mamdani.
- Coverage that aligns with right-wing narratives often leads to *controversial journalism* practices, risking the paper's credibility.
- The paper's attempt at *objectivity* sometimes results in a skewed depiction of reality, further embedding its reputation issues.

items.title: Waymo Introduces Teen Accounts for Robotaxi Service
items.author: Andrew J. Hawkins
items.summary:
- Waymo launches *teen accounts* in Phoenix, allowing those aged 14-17 to ride unaccompanied. 
- Enhanced safety measures include real-time location sharing and remote operator support for teen riders. 
- This initiative responds to declining teen driver's license rates and increasing interest in ride-hailing services among younger generations.

items.title: Google Maps on Garmin Smartwatches
items.author: Andrew Liszewski
items.summary:
- Garmin introduces a *free Google Maps app* for its smartwatches, providing basic *turn-by-turn directions*.
- The app requires an Android smartphone for destination searches, limiting its features compared to *Wear OS*.
- It supports over *90 smartwatch models* and vibrates for navigation prompts, allowing users to track their activities simultaneously.

items.title: The Last of Us Part II's New Mode in Chronological Order
items.author: Ash Parrish
items.summary:
- A new free patch for *The Last of Us Part II Remastered* offers a **Chronological Mode** for a linear gameplay experience. 
- The update includes new achievements and skins, enriching the roguelike *No Return* mode. 
- This mode provides players with a fresh way to engage with the story while anticipating the upcoming *HBO* season, especially from Abbyâ€™s perspective.

items.title: The Meta Quest 3S Lowest Price for Prime Day
items.author: Brandt Ranj
items.summary:
- The **Meta Quest 3S** is now available for the all-time low price of **$249**, down from **$299**.
- This VR headset features faster performance and better comfort while retaining the same screen resolution as the Quest 2.
- Users upgrading from Quest 2 will enjoy enhanced hardware, including the same chipset and controllers as the higher-end Quest 3.

items.title: Mastodon Enhancements: Profiles & Quote Posts
items.author: Jay Peters
items.summary:
- *Mastodon 4.4* introduces new profile features, including highlighting hashtags and a new *carousel* for pinned posts.
- The update simplifies creating and managing *lists*, enhancing user interaction.
- **Quote posts** are in development, with viewing support starting now and full functionality expected in the *4.5 release*.

items.title: Best Wireless Earbuds of 2025
items.author: Chris Welch
items.summary:
- The 2025 market offers a diverse range of *high-quality* wireless earbuds, suitable for various needs like fitness and calls. 
- Notable contenders include the **Sony WF-1000XM5**, known for exceptional sound and noise cancellation, and the **Bose QuietComfort Ultra**, which excels in active noise control. 
- Always consider comfort and compatibility, as brands often optimize features for their own devices.

items.title: Microsoft Teams now has threaded conversations
items.author: Tom Warren
items.summary:
- Microsoft Teams has introduced *threaded conversations*, enhancing user communication.
- Users can focus on important threads and easily share updates with the main conversation.
- The update includes new features like *multiple emoji reactions* and *GIF search*, improving overall usability.
